biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Dominique Besnehard  (born 5 February 1954) is a French actor. He has appeared in over 80 films and television shows since 1975. He starred in the 1983 film À nos amours, which was entered into the 34th Berlin International Film Festival
